snippet: Hundreds from India’s far northeast demonstrated outside a New Delhi police station, furious over the death of an 18-year-old and complaining of discrimination because of their East Asian features.
abstract: Hundreds of young protesters from India’s far northeast demonstrate outside police station in New Delhi after death of 18-year-old man who was beaten by shopkeepers in what they claim was racially motivated fight; complain of discrimination because of their East Asian features.

byline.original: By MALAVIKA VYAWAHARE and MAX BEARAK

lead_paragraph: Hundreds from India’s far northeast demonstrated outside a New Delhi police station, furious over the death of an 18-year-old and complaining of discrimination because of their East Asian features.

headline.main: Indians Protest, Saying a Death Was Tied to Bias
headline.print_headline: Indians Protest, Saying a Death Was Tied to Bias
